title:
Hi,



I just saw two vehicles that were vandalized at 4th and willard. They were spray painted with KKK and swastikas and the N word. One also had its tires slashed. I\'d be very interested to know who did this and what will happen to them.



Jennifer
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=15497
